.. -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

.. _bob.med.tb:

======================================================
 Active Tuberculosis Detection On CXR Package for Bob
======================================================

Package to train convolutional neural networks for tuberculosis detection on
frontal chest X-rays. Additionally, this package implements prediction
of TB on chest X-rays and evaluation of performances. It is build using
PyTorch.
